attributes.action: More flood Defenses around Chew Valley and Surrounding Area
attributes.additional_details:
CHEW VALLEY AND SURROUNDING AREA
We Want Funds to Stop The Flooding in our Homes And the Chew Valley area Too!!  The Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs has announced vulnerable areas in the south west are to receive £25m to reduce their risk of flooding.But Not Chew Valley near Bristol.Torrential rain in November caused considerable damage. In Chew Stoke the death of a man whose vehicle became submerged in flood water.The poor weather also saw hundreds of homes in Chew Valley And Surrounding Areas Are affected.The nationwide package see's construction start on 93 new flood defenses in England this year to improve protection for more than 64,000 homes So Why have we been left out!! experts have raised fears that areas with smaller populations are being ignored. Don't Let Us Be IGNORED!!
please sign show your support and help us get our floods reduced we don't want to see another death and we don;t want our homes flooded
